summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5409 for the improvement of Ravenna Place, from East 54th Street to Blakeley Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 67503, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
